summary: This is an FBI Electronic Communication (FD-1057) documenting an interview conducted as part of a federal investigation into the sexual exploitation of minors. The document records the interview of a victim, identified by the pseudonym 'Beale', and references the subject of the investigation, Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of a federal investigation regarding the sexual exploitation of minors.

persons.name: Beale
persons.context: A victim interviewed by the FBI as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. Identifying information (race: White, sex: Female) is recorded.

connections.description: Beale is identified as a victim interviewed in a federal investigation regarding the sexual exploitation of minors, with Epstein as the subject.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The FBI interviewed a victim, identified as 'Beale', as part of a federal investigation into the sexual exploitation of minors involving Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI Electronic Communication (FD-1057) dated December 4, 2018.
It documents an interview with a victim (pseudonym 'Beale') as part of a federal investigation into the sexual exploitation of minors.
Jeffrey Epstein is explicitly named as the subject of this federal investigation.
The victim is identified as a White female.
The document is part of case number 31E-MM-108062.
